data.message: Implement decision outcomes system for Duro MCP: Added validate_decision() and link_decision_to_episode() methods, MCP tools duro_validate_decision and duro_link_decision, structured outcome schema, and Test 5 to smoke suite. All 5 tests pass. Pushed to GitHub.
data.task: Implement decision outcomes system for Duro MCP
data.outcome: Added validate_decision() and link_decision_to_episode() methods, MCP tools duro_validate_decision and duro_link_decision, structured outcome schema, and Test 5 to smoke suite. All 5 tests pass. Pushed to GitHub.
